name: Cursed Walker
description:
Try to avoid touching the surfaces or you will create your obstacles. Grab the magic key and get the hell out of here with a portal.

Controls:
  • Right: D  /  Right Arrow  /  Left Joystick Right
  • Left: A  /  Left Arrow  /  Left Joystick Left
  • Jump: W  /   Space  /   Xbox A
  • Pause: P  /  Start
Credits:
  • Dev:  Enzo LEBLANC-GALBERT (SAGIII)
  • Art: Quentin EUNG (Shibii)
Special Thanks:
  • Kylian LEGUEN (Phnix)
  • Raphaël TAN (Chinoir)
Music from Pixabay Music from Zapsplat
